short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: you can sort TikTok tiles by oldest, newest, views, likes or comments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Arrange TikTok clips based on top views, likes, discussions, chronological age, and freshness. Additionally, organize profiles by their follower count.

Effortlessly categorize TikTok content by highest views, most likes, comments, from oldest to newest, and rank profiles by follower numbers.

This tool is user-friendly; simply download, select your preferred sorting criteria, then either search or navigate to a TikTok profile, and the extension will automatically organize your content.

Please be aware that this extension is currently in beta testing and might transition to a paid model in the future.
